name: Self-Reliance and Resource Generation
description: Developing independent systems to remove reliance on artificial scarcity tactics and centralized control.

cards.title: The Power of Self-Sufficiency
cards.description: Understanding how personal independence dismantles artificial scarcity systems.
bulletpoints: Self-sufficient individuals cannot be coerced through scarcity.
Building decentralized trade systems creates parallel economies.
Off-grid energy solutions reduce reliance on monopolized utilities.
cards.summaryText: Stay self-sufficient, build parallel trade circuits, and power yourself off-grid to dodge coercion.

cards.title: Creating Your Own Resource Streams
cards.description: Practical methods for generating food, energy, and trade goods.
bulletpoints: Urban farming, hydroponics, and vertical agriculture increase local food access.
Micro-energy grids can sustain small communities without external reliance.
Craftsmanship and trade skills provide resilience in economic downturns.
cards.summaryText: Grow food locally, launch micro-grids, and hone trade skills to generate your own resources.

cards.title: Decentralized Trade and Barter Networks
cards.description: Building alternative economic systems outside of fiat control.
bulletpoints: Cryptocurrency and digital barter systems enable decentralized trade.
Local exchange networks create resilience against market manipulation.
Alternative economies protect against artificial scarcity tactics.
cards.summaryText: Use crypto, local exchanges, and alternative economies to route around fiat scarcity games.
